full_summary:
Writing
ounty CMdue healthcare Workforce Shortages
==============================

### Tender Notice

* **Tender Title (English)**: Addressing Health Workforce Shortages
* **Tender Title (French)**: Addressant les Pénuries de Main-d'œuvre en Santé
* **Reference Number**: cb-5921-73273956
* **Tender Status**: Expired

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-26
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-06-12T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-07-03
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-06-30

### Contract

* **Contracting Entity**: Health Canada (Santé Canada)
* **Address**: 200 Eglantine Driveway, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0K9, Canada
* **Phone**: (343) 204-2699
* **Email**: [thomas.hyde@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:thomas.hyde@hc-sc.gc.ca)
* **Proposed Contract Duration**: 1 year, from July 1, 2023 to June 30, 2024

Extension option available: 1 year, from July 1, 2024 to June 30, 2025

### Tender Description

Health Canada's Strategic Policy Branch requires a contractor to provide services to support the mandate of the Task Force on Health Human Resources. This contract will enable Health Canada to advance policy analysis, stakeholder relationship management, and develop evidence-based approaches to address health workforce shortages.

### Eligibility

This tender is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified for Tier 1 and meet specific consultant category, security level, region, and level of expertise requirements.

### Invitation to Bid

The following contractors have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Accenture Inc.
* Acosys Consulting Services Inc.
* Avascent Canada ULC
* Beyond Technologies Consulting Inc.
* Calian Ltd.
* Deloitte Inc.
* Elevated Thinking Inc.
* Ernst & Young LLP
* KPMG LLP
* Le Groupe Conseil Bronson Consulting Group
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
* Orbis Risk Consulting
